mapper.select: select id,bank_name as text from t_contract_master where company_id=#{companyId} and is_active=0
select id,title as text from t_hotel where company_id=#{companyId} and is_active=0
select id,card_title as text from t_house where hotel_id=#{hotelId} and is_active=0

select t.*,c.id as cid,c.bank_name,c.phone,h.id as hid,h.title,u.card_title from t_house_rent_pay t,t_contract_master c,t_hotel h, t_house u where t.house_id=u.id and t.master_id=c.id and t.hotel_id=h.id and t.id = #{id}

select t.*,c.id as cid,c.bank_name,c.phone,h.id as hid,h.title,u.card_title from t_house_rent_pay t,t_contract_master c,t_hotel h,t_house u where t.house_id=u.id and t.master_id=c.id and t.hotel_id=h.id and t.company_id=#{companyId} order by t.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_house_rent_pay t,t_contract_master c,t_hotel h,t_house u where t.house_id=u.id and t.master_id=c.id and t.hotel_id=h.id and t.company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_house_rent_pay (master_id, hotel_id, company_id, baodi_pay, pay_time, pay_type, pay_period_start, pay_period_end, is_cash, description,is_active, house_id, first_pay, first_pay_time, sum_pay, area,house_count,shuidian,kongtiao,gongnuan,wuye) values (#{masterId}, #{hotelId}, #{companyId}, #{baodiPay},#{payTime}, #{payType}, #{payPeriodStart}, #{payPeriodEnd}, #{isCash}, #{description}, #{isActive}, #{houseId}, #{firstPay}, #{firstPayTime}, #{sumPay}, #{area},#{houseCount},#{shuidian},#{kongtiao},#{gongnuan},#{wuye})
mapper.update: update t_house_rent_pay set is_active=#{status} where id=#{id}
